General.Name: Sunwoda Electronic
General.Description: Sunwoda Electronic Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of lithium-ion battery modules worldwide. It operates though six segments: 3C Battery, EV Battery, Energy Service, Smart Hardware, Intelligent Manufacturing and Industrial Internet, and Testing Service. The company offers 3C batteries; batteries for mobile phones, laptops, and tablets; mobile power batteries; precision toolings; mobile phone and tablet products; and smart mobility and hardware batteries, as well as testing services. It also provides smart cash detectors, WIFI and BT3L modules, electronic handwriting boards, GAN chargers, electronic pens, and smart robots; smart watches and mirrors, frontal thermometers, electronic cigarettes, electric toothbrushes, hair dryers, posture adjustment instruments, and soothing instruments; and TWS headsets, recording pens, smart speakers and cameras, pan tilt cameras, story machines, and book robots. In addition, the company provides smart switches and gateways, sweeping machines, smart door locks, and air conditioning products; bicycle tachograph, driving recorder, and scooter products; battery cells and modules, battery packs, main control boxes, battery compartments, energy storage systems, indoor and outdoor cabinets, IDC backup power, and residential energy storage products, as well as consumer electronic lithium battery cells, automotive power cells, modules, PACK production lines, and related laser welding equipment. Sunwoda Electronic Co.,Ltd was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

2.Name: Mr. Wei  Zeng
